snippet: State media in China and an overseas labor watch group said some workers halted production lines, apparently over higher quality control standards.
abstract: Foxconn Technology Group denies reports of strike at Chinese iPhone factory, and says production is continuing without interruption.
lead_paragraph: State media in China and an overseas labor watch group said some workers halted production lines, apparently over higher quality control standards.

headline.seo: Foxconn Denies Report of Unrest at iPhone Factory
headline.main: Foxconn Denies Report of Unrest at iPhone Factory
headline.print_headline: Foxconn Denies Report of Unrest at iPhone Factory
